remarks: The inverse of an isomorphism ` F ` (which is unique because of ~ invf and is therefore denoted by ` ( ( X N Y ) `` F ) ` , see also remark 3.12 in [Adamek] p. 28) is invers to the isomorphism.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Apr-2017.)
